Datasets

Europeana is a database of some 30 million cultural and historical documents, images, sound and video files from Europe's museums, libraries, galleries and archives.

Filter by:

  • Library
  • Archive
  • Museum
  • Audiovisual

With the Europeana API, you can access the collections and incorporate them into things like apps, games, websites, even creating mash-ups using other APIs. The possibilities really are endless.

Here we highlight just some of the collections you can find through Europeana - explore them through the Europeana portal or directly through the API console.

Want to work with these collections? Register for your API key now.

  • Hungarian Data

    Since its founding in 1952 the Hungarian Theatre Museum and Institute has been collecting the most valuable relics and data of the Hungarian theatre.

    Dataset 12345 provided by Hungarian Theatre Museum and Institute. Contact me@example.com for more details.


    Portal API
    Art Theatre

  • Spanish Stuff

    En Cataluña, los proyectos promovidos por el Ministerio de Educación, Cultura y Deporte a través IPCE en los últimos cinco años han supuesto un gasto -vía inversión y subvención- de casi 29 millones de euros

    Dataset 23446 provided by Hispana. Contact spanish@example.com for more details.


    Portal API
    Art Gallery
